specials.name: I used this to catch fish
properties: Summons an ice pillar at different distances (S is closer, H is farther).
Inflicts 'Freeze' state on hit, enabling full-screen combo conversions.
Very slow startup with a distinct audio/visual cue, making it highly punishable on block or whiff.
specials.patch_notes: Active frames were more than doubled in a patch, making it a more effective gimmick for catching opponents off guard.

specials.name: Ice Field
properties: Dissipates the ice pillar to cover the ground in a slippery field, altering movement for both players.
A knockdown on the ice causes it to shatter for untechable damage, guaranteeing a setup.
A throw on the ice guarantees a combo into another Ice Spike, creating a pressure loop.
specials.patch_notes: Patches 1.43 and 1.44 fixed numerous bugs related to unintended high-speed movement and interactions with other characters' Overdrives.

specials.name: For searing cod
properties: Highly plus on block, making it a core tool for maintaining offensive pressure in blockstrings.

specials.name: We talked a lot together
properties: P version targets aerial opponents; K version stays grounded.
Both can be on screen simultaneously.
Extremely slow startup makes it useless in neutral, but it is the cornerstone of her post-knockdown pressure (oki).

specials.name: Michael Sword
properties: S version is a fast, mid-range projectile for poking.
H version is a slower, full-screen slash that causes a 'tumble state' on hit, allowing for combo follow-ups.
specials.patch_notes: The S version was patched to cause a knockdown on hit, transforming it from a simple poke into a valuable 'Clean' knockdown tool.

specials.name: For roasting chestnuts
properties: Creates a lingering hitbox that destroys incoming projectiles.
Pre-patch, it was very slow and punishable even on success.
specials.patch_notes: Buffed significantly in Ver. 1.43. It is now a much stronger and more reliable neutral tool that causes a knockdown. Associated 'corner loops' used for safely setting up Wings of Light were removed.
